GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: Serves an array of the selected article

article.title: Living in the shadow of a great man
article.author: butter_bridge

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: Serves an array of comments attached to a specific article

comments.author: Sir Jim
comments.body: I love to comment so this is a comment

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: Adds a comment to a specific article chosen by id

addedComment.body: Commenting, commenting everyone loves to comment
addedComment.author: butter_bridge

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: Will change the ammount of votes for the selected article

exampleResponse.title: Eight pug gifs that remind me of mitch
exampleResponse.author: icellusedkars

DELETE /api/comments/comment_id.description: Will delete a specific comment selected by the comment_id
